statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability_rating > 3;
SELECT material_name FROM packaging_materials WHERE carbon_footprint < 0.5;
SELECT material_name, recyclability_rating FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY recyclability_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability_rating > 3 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials WHERE carbon_footprint < 0.5;
SELECT material_id, material_name, recyclability_rating FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY recyclability_rating ASC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials WHERE recyclability_rating < 3 AND carbon_footprint BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT material_id, material_name, carbon_footprint FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_score FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT * FROM material_metrics WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_score > 4.5;
SELECT m.material_name, mm.recyclable, mm.biodegradable FROM packaging_materials m JOIN material_metrics mm ON m.id = mm.material_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_score FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT id, material_name, sustainability_score FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_score > 0.8;
SELECT material_name, weight, recyclable, biodegradable FROM packaging_materials AS pm JOIN material_metrics AS mm ON pm.id = mm.material_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%paper%';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, sustainability_score FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_score FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM material_properties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM material_metrics WHERE metric_value < 100;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_score > 0.5 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_score FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND sustainability_score > 0.3;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, AVG(material_metrics.metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM packaging_materials JOIN material_metrics ON packaging_materials.material_id = material_metrics.metric_id GROUP BY packaging_materials.material_name;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'P%' AND sustainability_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;

SELECT packaging_materials.material_name, material_properties.property_name FROM packaging_materials LEFT JOIN material_properties ON packaging_materials.material_id = material_properties.property_id WHERE material_properties.property_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_rating FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, metric_name, unit_of_measure FROM packaging_materials JOIN material_metrics ON packaging_materials.id = material_metrics.metric_id;
SELECT material_name, value FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_metrics ON packaging_materials.id = packaging_metrics.packaging_material_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_rating FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM material_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;

SELECT material_name, metric_name, value FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_metrics ON packaging_materials.id = packaging_metrics.packaging_material_id JOIN material_metrics ON packaging_metrics.metric_id = material_metrics.metric_id;

SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, material_name FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_metrics ON packaging_materials.id = packaging_metrics.packaging_material_id GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Supplier;
SELECT material_name, category FROM PackagingMaterial ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Supplier WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT packaging_id, quantity FROM PackagingMetrics WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY packaging_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, date, sustainability_score FROM SustainabilityReports WHERE sustainability_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterial WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, category FROM PackagingMaterial WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Supplier ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT date, sustainability_score FROM SustainabilityReports WHERE sustainability_score > 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT material_name, weight FROM PackagingMaterial JOIN MaterialMetrics ON PackagingMaterial.material_id = MaterialMetrics.material_id ORDER BY weight DESC;
